title: The 'smart and cheeky' Aboriginal boy teaching Australia a lesson
description: A film about an Aboriginal boy's experience of school shines a light on Australia's failure to give all children a fair start.

title: 'Our first day of freedom on American soil'
description: Adrian Meza and his family from Nicaragua have just been released from detention by US border officials.

title: Michelle Obama: Black parents have 'fear in our hearts'
description: The former US first lady says she is worried her daughters could be racially profiled.

title: #MeToo Serbia: 'I thought I was the only one'
description: Balkan women are sharing their sexual assault stories after Serbian actress Milena Radulovic went public with hers.

title: 'My model railway is my little dream world'
description: A painstaking recreation of a lost railway line has delighted fans on social media.

title: Scottish election results: The story so far
description: The key results and moments from the first day of counting in the Holyrood election.

title: Murray to practise with Djokovic and hopes to be fit for French Open
description: Andy Murray will practise with Novak Djokovic in Rome on Sunday and hopes to return to action in 10 days' time.

title: India's Covid crisis: Rural hospitals unable to cope as virus spreads
description: We uncover the conditions that patients face in health centres unequipped for a crisis like Covid.

title: 'Premier League the most important title' - Guardiola craves win which would make Man City champions
description: Preview followed by live coverage of Saturday's Premier League game between Manchester City and Chelsea.

title: Covid: St Albans cathedral's new carving features facemask
description: The restoration of a shrine takes more than a year, having been interrupted by the pandemic.

title: Elections 2021: Labour insiders on Starmer, what went wrong and how to fix it
description: Sir Keir Starmer took charge of Labour a year ago and has faced his first challenge at the polls.

title: Scottish election 2021: First result announced as counting continues
description: The Liberal Democrats comfortably hold the Orkney seat as counting continues across the country.

title: Poplar fire: London tower block blaze leaves two men in hospital
description: London Fire Brigade said 38 adults and four children were evacuated from the 19-storey building.

title: Elections 2021: Conservatives hail historic Labour defeat in Hartlepool by-election
description: Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer comes under fire after the constituency elects its first Tory MP.

title: Covid travel rules: 'Green list' countries to be revealed
description: England’s list of “green countries”, with fewest restrictions, is expected to be released later.

title: Noel Clarke: BBC 'shocked' by allegations of harassment on Doctor Who set
description: The Guardian newspaper reports that five women allege he sexually harassed them on the Doctor Who set.

title: Julia James: Man's photo issued in PCSO murder hunt
description: Police say the man, who was in Aylesham the day after Julia James died, could help the inquiry.

title: Elections results 2021: Tory gains as first English councils declare
description: But many of the local election results are still to come, with further results expected throughout the weekend.

title: Twitter adds 'tip jar' to pay for good tweeting
description: Twitter launches a new payment feature for good tweets - but it comes with privacy concerns.

title: Under 40s to be offered alternative to AZ vaccine
description: Link to rare blood clots leads to shift in vaccination programme for younger age groups.

title: Spanish Grand Prix: Mercedes' Valtteri Bottas tops first practice session
description: Valtteri Bottas heads Max Verstappen and Lewis Hamilton in a tight first practice session at the Spanish Grand Prix.

title: Coldplay's Chris Martin says lockdown made him confront his ego
description: The star says the lockdown forced him to ask: "Who am I without Wembley Stadium saying, 'you're awesome'?"

title: Turner Prize honours art collectives who 'inspire change'
description: After a year of closed galleries, the 2021 nominees are all groups who have all "inspired change".

title: India Covid: How bad is the second wave?
description: There are signs infections have slowed in some regions - but is India past the worst?

title: Big Chinese rocket segment set to fall to Earth
description: Tracking radars are following closely the gradual fall to Earth of a large Chinese rocket vehicle.

title: Train named after Great Escape hero who 'inspired Steve McQueen'
description: Wing Cdr Ken Rees is said to have inspired Steve McQueen's character in the classic film.

title: Rag 'n' Bone Man talks about his struggles with fame
description: Singer-songwriter Rag 'n' Bone Man says he wanted his friends to rescue him from red carpets.

title: Disability and domestic abuse: 'No-one knows what is happening behind those walls'
description: As cases of domestic abuse rise during lockdown, disabled victims can face particular challenges to escape their abusers.
